title: BeaconBlocksByRangeIntegrationTest flaky test
body:
tech.pegasys.teku.networking.eth2.BeaconBlocksByRangeIntegrationTest is flaky. Here is the last time I saw it failing:
https://app.circleci.com/pipelines/github/ConsenSys/teku/23948/workflows/9ab88890-266c-4ca6-89d6-44d25741bc33/jobs/173779

Some extra info in case we lose Circle CI execution details:

```
java.lang.AssertionError: 
Expecting throwable message:
  "tech.pegasys.teku.networking.eth2.rpc.core.RpcException$ExtraDataAppendedException: [Code 1] Extra data appended to end of message:  extra data: ByteBuf{UnpooledSlicedByteBuf(ridx: 0, widx: 402, cap: 402/402, unwrapped: UnpooledHeapByteBuf(ridx: 0, widx: 422, cap: 422/422)), content: }"
to contain:
  "Must request blocks with compatible fork."
but did not.

Throwable that failed the check:
```
